description: PIMS 2979 Sustainable Land Management Pilot Project

subproject.corporate outcome: Enabling Climate Change Adpatation policy established, Sustinable Land Managment mainstreamed into sectors.
subproject.description: The project will create enabling environment (policy, capacity, knowledge, alternatives) necessary for adoption of Sustainable Land Management SLM) practices and alleviate environmental degradation while improving livelihoods of the farming communities of the Central Highland Zone.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
